definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Hard work and plain living is a cherished heritage of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦朴素的作风是中国人民的传家宝。

sentences.english: It was passed down one games despite other it bearrived an "Heirloom".
sentences.chinese: 这样一届一届传下去，就成了“传家宝”了。

sentences.english: This is another reason that authentic heirloom dZi are seldom seen in the marketplace.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个原因，真正的天珠传家宝很少出现在市场。

sentences.english: What do they want to do with the heirlooms?
sentences.chinese: 家里的传家宝要怎么处置？

sentences.english: Heirlooms are not just hand-me-down artifacts anymore.
sentences.chinese: 传家宝不再仅仅是二手的手工艺品了。

sentences.english: The caster heirlooms are by default the best ones.
sentences.chinese: 在连铸机的传家宝默认情况下是最好的。

sentences.english: Date palm trees in Iraq are passed down through generations as part of family legacies.
sentences.chinese: 在伊拉克，枣椰树是作为一种传家宝世代相传的。

sentences.english: This jade pendant is our family heirloom.
sentences.chinese: 这块玉佩是咱们家的传家宝。

sentences.english: It was passed down one game after another and it has become an heirloom.
sentences.chinese: 这样一届一届传下去，就成了“传家宝”了。

sentences.english: He left them as sacred heirlooms to his children.
sentences.chinese: 他把它们作为神圣的传家宝留给了孩子们。

sentences.english: Disable heirloom exchange when you don't have any heirlooms.
sentences.chinese: 禁用的传家宝交流时，你没有任何的传家宝。

sentences.english: Disable heirloom exchange when you don't have any heirlooms.
sentences.chinese: 禁用的传家宝交流时，你没有任何的传家宝。

sentences.english: Decanters don't need to be expensive cut glass crystal heirlooms.
sentences.chinese: 醒酒器不一定非得要是昂贵的水晶制得传家宝。

sentences.english: The couple’s display mixes family heirlooms with vintage and travel finds.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妻将传家宝和古董，旅行发现的物品一起陈列。

definition: to pass on through the generations
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
passed on from ancestors/handed down from generation to generation
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
